title: List of Looney Tunes feature films
data: Western starring John Wayne , animated bat in the titles at the beginning . The opening animated sequence is included on Looney Tunes Golden Collection , vol . 6 as a special feature
RKO Pictures , live-action feature film , with animation sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio , directed by Bob Clampett
Paramount Pictures film , with animation sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio

Republic Pictures film , with animation sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio . Paddy The Pig is the star of the sequence character resembles the some of the earliest incarnations of Porky Pig
Paramount Pictures film , with animation titles sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio
Paramount Pictures film , with animation titles sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio
United Artists film , with animation sequences produced by Leon Schlesinger studio
Animated sequence with a cameo appearance of Bugs Bunny . The animated sequence is included on Looney Tunes Golden Collection , vol . 1 as a special feature
Cameo appearance of Bugs Bunny and Tweety . The cameo scenes included on Looney Tunes Golden Collection , vol . 1 as a special feature

A Disney / Amblin film released by Touchstone Pictures . Cameo appearances by Looney Tunes characters including Bugs Bunny , Daffy Duck , Porky Pig , Tweety , Wile E. Coyote and the Road Runner , Sylvester , Foghorn Leghorn , Marc Antony , and Yosemite Sam
Opening animated sequence with Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck , Porky Pig at the ending
Sequel to the 2002 film adaptation of Scooby-Doo originally by Hanna-Barbera . Cameo by Tazmanian Devil , where in one scene of the film Scooby-Doo drinks a potion that transforms him into Taz
Steven Spielberg -directed Amblin Entertainment film distributed by Warner Bros. Marvin the Martian appears as a character in the film 's digital setting
Teen Titans Go ! To the Movies
Opening animated sequence with wacky Daffy Duck in references to the earliest incarnations of the character and Porky Pig in the Warner Bros . Animation opening logo
intro: This is a list of feature films with appearances by the Looney Tunes characters, either centered on that series or just cameo roles only.
